articles.title: Taylor Swift Recovers Like a Pro After Stage Malfunction During TTPD Section of New Orleans Eras Tour Show - PEOPLE
articles.description: Taylor Swift managed to work through a stage malfunction during the 'Tortured Poets Department' section of her Eras Tour show in New Orleans — when a prop that carries her around, affectionately dubbed the 'Tayoomba' by fans, stopped working mid-performance.
articles.content:
